languages.text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, their single target melee, {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}, and area attacks gain +20% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover penetration{/g} against enemies adjacent to the commander or their allies.
languages.original_text: Когда на командира Астра Милитарум действует способность Эффективная муштра, его одиночные атаки в ближнем и {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дальнем бою{/g}, а также атаки по области получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}пробитию укрытия{/g} против врагов, находящихся на соседних клетках с ним самим или его союзниками.

traits.locale_text: While the Astra Militarum Commander is under the Combined Arms effect, their Single target melee and ranged attacks and Area of Effect attacks gain +20% to Dodge Reduction, Parry Reduction and Cover Penetration against enemies that are adjacent to the Commander or their allies.

While the Astra Militarum Commander is under the Combined Arms effect, their Single target melee and ranged attacks and Area of Effect attacks gain +20% to Dodge Reduction, Parry Reduction and Cover Penetration against enemies that are adjacent to the Commander or their allies.

While the Astra Militarum Commander is under the Combined Arms effect, their single target melee, ranged attacks, and area of effect attacks gain +20% to dodge reduction, parry reduction, and cover penetration against enemies adjacent to the Commander or their allies.

languages.text: Когда на командира Астра Милитарум действует способность Эффективная муштра, его одиночные атаки в ближнем и {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дальнем бою{/g}, а также атаки по области получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}пробитию укрытия{/g} против врагов, находящихся на соседних клетках с ним самим или его союзниками.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, their single target melee, {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}, and area attacks gain +20% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover penetration{/g} against enemies adjacent to the commander or their allies.

traits.locale_text: Когда на командира Астра Милитарум действует способность Совместные учения, его одиночные атаки в ближнем и дальнем бою, а также атаки по области получают +20% к снижению уклонения, снижению парирования и пробитию укрытия против врагов, находящихся на соседних клетках с командиром или его союзниками.

Когда на командира Астра Милитарум действует способность Совместные учения, его одиночные атаки в ближнем и дальнем бою, а также атаки по области получают +20% к снижению уклонения, снижению парирования и пробитию укрытия против врагов, находящихся на соседних клетках с командиром или его союзниками.

languages.text: Solange der Astra Militarum-Commander unter dem Effekt Regimentstaktiken steht, erhalten seine Einzelziel-Nahkampf-, {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampf{/g}- und Flächenangriffe +20 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungsdurchdringung{/g} gegen Feinde in der Nähe des Commanders oder seiner Verbündeten.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, their single target melee, {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}, and area attacks gain +20% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover penetration{/g} against enemies adjacent to the commander or their allies.

traits.locale_text: Solange der Astra Militarum-Commander unter dem Effekt Verbundene Waffen steht, erhalten seine Einzelziel-Nahkampf-, Fernkampf- und Flächenangriffe +20% auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Paradereduzierung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungsdurchdringung{/g} gegen Gegner in der Nähe des Commanders oder seiner Verbündeten.

languages.text: Lorsque le commandant de l'Astra Militarum est sous l'effet d'Armes Combinées, ses attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} à cible unique, ses attaques {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}à distance{/g} et ses {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} reçoivent un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}pénétration de couverture{/g} de +20 % contre les ennemis adjacents au commandant ou à ses alliés.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, their single target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks, and {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} gain +20% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover penetration{/g} against enemies adjacent to the commander or their allies.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le commandant de l'Astra Militarum est sous l'effet d'Armes Combinées, ses attaques de mêlée à cible unique, ses attaques à distance et ses attaques de zone reçoivent un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}pénétration de couverture{/g} de +20 % contre les ennemis adjacents au commandant ou à ses alliés.

languages.text: 当星界军指挥官受军团战术效果影响时，当指挥官使用单体近战{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程攻击{/g}或范围攻击，攻击本人身边或盟友身边的敌人时，此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}防御减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体穿透{/g}提高20%。
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, their single target melee, {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}, and area attacks gain +20% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover penetration{/g} against enemies adjacent to the commander or their allies.

traits.locale_text: 当星界军指挥官受联合突击效果影响时，当指挥官使用单体近战攻击、远程攻击或范围攻击，攻击本人身边或盟友身边的敌人时，此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}防御减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体穿透{/g}提高20%。

languages.text: Cuando el comandante del Astra Militarum está bajo los efectos de Tácticas de regimiento, sus ataques de un objetivo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}a distancia{/g} y sus {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} ganan un +20 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}penetración{/g} de cobertura contra enemigos adyacentes al comandante o a sus aliados.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, their single target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks, and {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} gain +20% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover penetration{/g} against enemies adjacent to the commander or their allies.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el comandante del Astra Militarum está bajo los efectos de Arsenal combinado, sus ataques de un objetivo cuerpo a cuerpo y a distancia y sus ataques de área ganan un +20 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}penetración de cobertura{/g} contra enemigos adyacentes al comandante o a sus aliados.

languages.text: 帝国防衛軍司令が連隊戦術効果を受けている時、その単体対象{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}/{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠隔{/g}/{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲{/g}攻撃は、司令やその味方に隣接する敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽貫通{/g}が+20%される。
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, their single target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks, and {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} gain +20% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover penetration{/g} against enemies adjacent to the commander or their allies.

traits.locale_text: 帝国防衛軍司令が連携軍隊効果を受けている時、その単体対象近接/遠隔/範囲攻撃は、司令やその味方に隣接する敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽貫通{/g}が+20%される。
